dct_title_s: L'AMERIQVE Autrement Le NOVVEAV MONDE et INDES OCCIDENTALES
dct_description_sm: 1664; With "chez l'Autheur, proche le For l'Evesque." California with 12 place names and with Mer de Californie named; Anien shown on mainland where coastline continues north and forms large bay. "Explication de Marques" added above title cartouche. Explanatory text in North America, and many added place names throughout. "Lhuilier sculp." (lower left).
California with flat northern coast sloping up to east. Destroit d Anien, Anien, and Terre de Iesso to the north.
Wagner 425; Wheat 64; Tooley 20 (Plate 36) & 21; Leighly 45; BN Duval II B(4); BN Duval II C(11); UCB; Philip Burden, correspondence, 1995; Burden 311 (Plate312).
Par P. Du Val d'Abbeuille Geographe Ordinaire du Roy.
